H0.text: What was the US spacecraft first to return images of Mars to Earth, in July 1965. Ranger 7

H1.text: What was the US spacecraft first to return images of Mars to Earth, in July 1965. Surveyor 1

H2.text: What was the US spacecraft first to return images of Mars to Earth, in July 1965. Lunar Orbiter 1

H3.text: What was the US spacecraft first to return images of Mars to Earth, in July 1965. Mariner4

A4.text: Mariner 4 performed the first successful flyby of the planet Mars, returning the first close-up pictures of the Martian surface.

A5.text: Mariner 4 captured the first images of another planet ever returned from deep space.
